- __What is the role of islands of fertility in the carbon cycle?:__ Areas with high levels of nutrients and organic matter that form under canapy trees and shrubs in arid ecosystems.
- __How will elevated CO2 affect islands of fertility?:__ Areas with high levels of nutrients and organic matter that form under canapy trees and shrubs in arid ecosystems.
- __:__ Islands help promote the persistence of shrubs in the community. Islands make plants resistant to environmental perturbations
